channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Born To The Badge
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Stuart Friedman)
item.description: Yesterday he'd lost his job, his badge and his future because of the mockingly beautiful juror; today he had to risk his very life --- for the sake of her kidnapped child.
